attributes.action: Stop Insurance company's being sexist and charge boys the same as girls!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a respecatable 18 year old boy from wales I don't appriciate having to pay triple the amount of car insurance than girls my age just because of a few idiotic drivers. Its wrong, there should be something in the test to mark what type of person you are to decide on insurance not just you gender!

rejection.details: This petiotion overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/no2shelia/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
